data.title: Sremski Karlovci
data.text:
Northern Serbia: Sremski Karlovci & Novi Sad Full-Day Group Tour from Belgrade

Enjoy a whole day, complete the Northern Serbia experience, and get to know everything about the area on this tour. Choose between a private and a small shared group, with live, professional guidance and an air-conditioned vehicle. You'll visit one orthodox monastery in a region known as 'The Holy Mountain of Serbia,' a lovely baroque town of Sremski Karlovci, the ...

Novi Sad and Sremski Karlovci - Friday

Join us in exploring two charming towns, Novi Sad and Sremski Karlovci. Get to know them in detail, in a different way, and enrich yourself with another life experience.. ...

Vojvodina tour - Novi Sad, Sremski Karlovci, Monastery Krušedol - private toure tour

Get to know the rich history of the Fruška Gora Mount, Sremski Karlovci. Petrovaradin and Novi Sad, and continue exploring hidden treasures of Vojvodina Plain and its' beauty. ...

Fruška gora hike and wine tour - Friday

Step into an oasis of peace, into the heart of Fruška Gora, and explore the charms that this fantastic mountain offers. Enjoy its trails, monasteries, and the surrounding nature. ...

The monastery tour across Fruška gora - Monday

This monastery tour on Fruška Gora offers every traveler a spiritual journey through the rich Serbian history and culture. Visit well-preserved monasteries of Fruška Gora and feel the peace and spiritual strength of this beautiful mountainous region, carrying that sense of peace with you ...
